precontext: The team gathered in a dimly lit room to discuss the next phase of their project. Everyone knew that their work required secrecy and careful planning. They needed to make adjustments to ensure everything went smoothly.
sentence: There was a suggestion that they should move underground for the next stage of the process.
ending: That way, nobody could discover their hidden plans.
meanings_considered: under the level of the ground
conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
explanation:
• "Move underground" in the context of secrecy and hidden plans strongly supports the second meaning (conducted with hidden aims) as the precontext and ending explicitly reference hidden intentions.  
• The first meaning (under the level of the ground) is implausible because the setting is a dimly lit room, and there is no mention of physical infrastructure or subterranean locations.  
• The ending "nobody could discover their hidden plans" directly reinforces the metaphorical use of "underground" to mean secret or hidden, confirming the second meaning.
clear_meaning_text: conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
